Terms.ShortDescription: any particle that has integer spin
Terms.LongDescription: A boson is any particle that has integer spin.

Terms.ShortDescription: any particle that has half-integer spin
Terms.LongDescription: A fermion is any particle that has half-integer spin.

Terms.ShortDescription: a massless, electrically neutral particle that mediates the electromagnetic interaction
Terms.LongDescription: The photon is a massless, electrically neutral particle that mediates the electromagnetic interaction.
Terms.Etymology: from Greek photo-, combining form of phos, meaning 'light', and -on, the suffix for particle names
